Name: Woodlock Manor
About the game: Your beloved grandfather, Sir Issac Woodlock sadly passed away at the age of 132. In his will, he leaves all his inheritance and estate to you but under one condition. You must pass the trials of his manor to prove you are worthy of not only his vast wealth but the Woodlock family name itself! Dodge spike traps, avoid large buzz saws, and outwit dangerous laser beams in this grid-based puzzle game to reach the end of the manor to claim your grandfather's vast fortune! FEATURES Over 45+ Levels Over 30-45 minutes of gameplay Uncover the mysteries of Woodlock Manor Special thanks to Darren Curtis for 'My Dark Passenger', the trailer music!
